sub_title: Sustainable Business Europe | FMCG and Product Sustainability
summary:
I believe in creating equitable and sustainable communities, be it from an individual or on a global scale. To work in that direction, I have sought out various experiences to broaden my horizons, be dedicated in the work I put myself in, yet be humble and willing to learn. This has developed my urge to re-examine the status quo and constantly building on understanding through empathy.
My degrees in Urban Planning and Human Settlements are just two of many platforms available to leverage my acquired experiences, skills, and nature to produce better and happier people. Currently, I have expanded that platform into passionately providing opportunities to maximize potential of individuals.

Urban and Regional Planning Exchange Student

certifications.name: Smart Cities: Solving Urban Problems Using Technology

profile_positions.description:
Since 2003, Acre has enabled aspirational organisations to create real change by embedding impactful, purpose-driven people in their teams - from sustainability practitioners to CEOs. 
Our vision for a more sustainable future drives us - we recognise the difference the right people make. After all, businesses don’t create change; people do. With a deep understanding of your ambitions, we will find and develop the talent your business needs to find more sustainable ways of operating, build resilience, and manage risk. 
Whether you’re at the beginning of a transition driven by sustainability and ESG or have a business based on creating social value or climate-conscious solutions - our two decades of experience in sustainability recruitment, and extensive global network, will help you get to where you need to be. 
Get in contact with our offices in London, New York & Amsterdam today to discuss roles within Sustainable Business, Sustainable Finance and Sustainable Energy.

I have developed specialisation within the following sustainability areas/sectors:
- Product sustainability-related (LCA, Eco-design, GHG management)
- Packaging
- Fashion, apparel, & textiles
- NGOs, membership organisations, & industry bodies
profile_positions.title: Senior Consultant - Sustainable Business

profile_positions.description:
TRIIIO is a specialist Technical Recruitment Consultancy in IT founded by local Malaysian partners coming from diverse backgrounds to ensure a strong internal culture was formed. We pride ourselves in having a high engagement model of recruitment that is modular and customer specific hence, candidates represented through our process are activated to meet business needs with respect to customers' Strategy, Culture, Operations, Technology, and Service. 

Every candidate approached and vetted through TRIIIO is handled with utmost care and respect to their skill vertex, career goals, interests, and aspirations as well as to ensure expectations are set and met for any active job opportunities that are presented. 

Roles that I have been involved in recruiting includes, but not limited to, Program Director - Digital Transformation, Head of IT Infrastructure, Technical Architect, Customer Service Manager, Development Lead, Development Engineers, Application Support, IT Project Manager.

Personal involvements:
- Implemented video outreach strategy which saw immediate results in candidate engagement.
- Sourcing techniques with GitHub, talent network, referrals, Boolean searches, and social media platforms.
- Stakeholder management. Advising hiring managers and HR teams by providing consultation on talent acquisition solutions, market insights, and salary negotiations.
- Lead work-stream of projects. Developing strategies for hard-to-fill/urgent roles, manage timelines, talent mapping, talent assessment.
- Improved internal processes; built organisation process of candidates in internal database, implemented and led design thinking workshops, created TRIIIO's employee cultural deck, restructured job description to ensure consistency of information across all teams.
profile_positions.title: Senior Consultant

profile_positions.description:
TRIIIO is a specialist Technical Recruitment Consultancy (IT & Engineering) founded by local Malaysian partners coming from diverse backgrounds to ensure a strong internal culture was formed. We pride ourselves in having a high engagement model of recruitment that is modular and customer specific hence, candidates represented through our process are activated to meet business needs with respect to customers' Strategy, Culture, Operations, Technology and Service. 

Every candidate approached and vetted through TRIIIO is handled with utmost care and respect to their skill vertex, career goals, interests and aspirations as well as to ensure expectations are set and met for any active job opportunities that are presented. 

We also curate and create detailed employee value propositions to help long term branding strength for our customers, helping with offer acceptance, and ensuring that your business is enabled to attract and retain the right talent, long term.

Working closely with parties in MDEC and organizations such as InvestKL, we have also helped with the landing and starting up of foreign multinationals setting up their IT business units in KL. This relationship and success of our delivery are due to the consistent performance of our high engagement model that enables us to identify, manage and place technical talent at any stage (start-ups to mature establishments) of business, and at any level.

Successful track record of service in:

Oracle/Java Technologies (Front End/Back End/Full Stack)
Microsoft Technologies (C#.Net/SQL)
Cisco Technologies (CCNA/CCNP/CCIE - RnS/SP/DC/Security)
Windows/Linux Server Technologies
Application & Infrastructure Support (L1 to L4)
QA Manual & Automation

Would love to have an opportunity to see how I can add value to your career or organisation. Do reach out to me via Linkedin or email at thaddeus.tan@trii.io.
profile_positions.title: Associate Consultant

profile_positions.description:
Apart from DPZ's other offices, it has working collaboration with numerous expertise from around the world both from the network of New Urbanist planners and Architects that has significant working experiences globally and from extensive personal network of collaborative associates.
All of the work of the firm, from urban redevelopment to residential neighborhood design, from long range master planning to design guidelines, is undertaken with a clear focus and uncompromising quality. This is the driving force behind each project ensuring a truly comprehensive design process.

My role in DPZ Asia primarily included, but not limited to:
- Analysing and providing recommendations for future guidelines of the First-Last Mile of multiple transit stations within Kuala Lumpur and the Klang Valley.
- Responsible for preparing presentation packs of master plans for presentation to clients and board of directors.
profile_positions.title: Assistant Planner (Freelance)

profile_positions.description:
A new energy service for medium to large industries (min. RM100,000/month electricity cost) to increase energy efficiency by approximately 18-20%. 

Sales & Marketing Achievements:
- ~66% of sales presentation conducted resulted in positive interest, either with agreement on installation of service or a proof of concept request within their facilities.
- Most prominent clients presented to includes: Texchem (Malaysia), Dongwha Malaysia, and One Medicare Sdn Bhd.  

Role & Responsibilities:
- Learning and developing a sales process to be followed
- Creating presentation pack and presentation structure
- Understanding the energy saving & efficiency market
- Understanding and solving clients needs and concerns
profile_positions.title: Sales Marketing Executive

profile_positions.description:
In one of Adelaide's renowned Indian restaurants, my primary responsibility was to ensure the delivery of exceptional customer service by working both independently and as a team.
Roles included:  
- Supporting management of the restaurant.
- Training of new staff members.
- Attending to customers needs and enquiries.
- Handling of sales.
profile_positions.title: Customer Service Associate

profile_positions.description:
A semester work placement as part of the Bachelor degree.  I was tasked with assisting the amendment of the North Adelaide Large Institutions and Colleges Development Plan in assessing 11 significant sites. 
In addition, I was assigned to assess a range of residential and commercial development applications within the Council area and prepared report submissions.
I was also able to contribute to the Placemaking team in compiling and reviewing a public survey conducted regarding connection/laneway improvements.
profile_positions.title: Cadet planning officer (Work experience)

profile_positions.description:
A 3 months internship with an environmental assessment firm. My responsibilities were:
- Completion of geospatial calculations and reports.
- Conducting multiple Impact Assessment public surveys, from door-to-door.
- Assist with note taking during site visits and other required tasks in the office.
profile_positions.title: Intern

profile_positions.description:
My role was both an administrative assistant for a Member of Parliament as well as a point of contact for the community in which the office (a community centre) served. My duties included:
- Organising multiple fundraising events with one having an attendance
of 150+ people.
- Responding and liaising with clients/public, political branches, and public
departments regarding public concerns and enquiries.
- Organising and ensuring the delivery of large book orders written by the MP.
- Other administrative duties.
profile_positions.title: Administrative Assistant for Member of Parliament

volunteer_experiences.description: Helped plan and organise the City of Unley's Young Minds Market: a night market in conjunction with National Youth Week designed to showcase a wide range of innovative ideas, artworks and delicious foods from young people living across the City of Unley.
Assisted in building a house for the indigenous community from the foundation up in the Belum Rainforest, Malaysia over 4 days.
